post.body: happy to vote for you, Mari, your appearance on Joan Sotkin's blogtalkradio show or teleclass intro'd me to FB and Twitter. Thx.
I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
This newbie discovered how to search for what I missed!!!
We began w/ a newsletter (pre internet) called "just jazz," then as it expanded to include all sorts of creativity, added NOT
Children's choir -- how great!!! Enjoy.
Saw you mentioned videos coming; any sched. yet?
How sweet, love being grandma? How are things going w/ the film, see you've diversified!
haven't read art. you mentioned, but YES, things are opening up tons. Thank you, Oprah, and all of us.
Thx for your reply re Baeth, which I missed (figured out how to search and catch up). THANKS.
Again, appreciate your tweeting about my CD. Very MUCH.
Sorry to not get back, just found out how many replies I missed, thanks for explaination of your shorthand.
It's not that nostalgic but I missed them first time around -- my favorite reruns are The West Wing.
thanks for the sweet tweet about moi (singer who tweets: http://www.ellifordyce.com/music.html). Always appreciate a great plug
tell me about your live gigging.
figured out I missed some answers by searching my handle. Yours was in the pile from 5 days ago!
Sorry, never answered your last tweet -- learned to find what was missed so I can keep up! LOL. Twitter, twitter.
Sorry I never acknowledged your sweet tweet (just searched to find what I'd missed!). Thank YOU.
Sorry for delay, just searched and found your response about abe in Bristol. after 8+ years, they still amaze and absorb me.
Sorry for long delay to your great reply re awareness of our own energy emitted-agreed (learned to find tweets missed earlier)
in a search I found your sweet response 3 days ago, thanks for all your support and great intentions. Will do my best.
